QW_CUI_C1.name: Voice Input Availability
QW_CUI_C1.description: This test checks whether the chatbot includes a voice input option, such as a microphone button.

QW_CUI_C2.name: Clarity of Chatbot Responses
QW_CUI_C2.description: This test checks whether the chatbot's responses are written in clear and simple language.

QW_CUI_C3.name: Localized Date Format in Chatbot Responses
QW_CUI_C3.description: This test checks whether the chatbot displays dates using the user's local format.

QW_CUI_C4.name: Chatbot Response Language Consistency
QW_CUI_C4.description: This test checks whether the chatbot replies in the same language as the website.

QW_CUI_C5.name: Chatbot Response Matches User Language
QW_CUI_C5.description: This test checks whether the chatbot replies in the same language used by the user.

QW_CUI_C6.name: Localized Currency Format in Chatbot Responses
QW_CUI_C6.description: This test checks whether the chatbot displays currency values using the user's local format.

QW_CUI_C7.name: Localized Units of Measurement in Chatbot Responses
QW_CUI_C7.description: This test checks whether the chatbot displays units of measurement according to the user's local format.

QW_CUI_C8.name: Availability of Chatbot Help Commands
QW_CUI_C8.description: This test checks whether the chatbot offers a clear way for users to request information about its purpose and available functions.

QW_CUI_C9.name: Privacy Terms and Policy Disclosure in Chatbot
QW_CUI_C9.description: This test checks whether the chatbot provides clear information about how user data is collected, stored, or used when asked about privacy.

QW_CUI_C10.name: Human Assistance Availability in Chatbot
QW_CUI_C10.description: This test checks whether the chatbot provides a clear option to reach a human representative when users request human assistance or when automated support is insufficient.
